content.detailedDescription:
Venerdi sera eravamo davanti un bancomat a fare prelievo, nella via principale di santa maria degli angeli (assisi). mentre aspettavamo in macchina un mio amico ha gridato di guardare dal finestrino, su in alto. 
io mi sono affacciato e non ci credevo... (fino a ieri ero uno scettico di ufo). c'erano 3 luci rosse che volavano troppo vicine fra di loro per essere aerei, la luce pulsava lentamente, da rosso accesso a nessuna luce nel giro di qualche secondo. i "velivoli" continuavano il loro cammino nel cielo lentamente, ad un certo punto uno di questi scompare, gli altri due salgono in alto verso il cielo, verticalmente e prima uno, poi l'altro spariscono entrambi...
siamo rimasti sbalorditi


friday night we were in front of an atm to make withdrawal, the main street of santa maria degli angeli (assisi). while we waited in the car my friend shouted to look out the window on top.
 i looked out and could not believe it ... (until yesterday i was a skeptic of ufos). there were 3 red lights that flew too close together for air, the light slowly pulsated from red no access to light in a few seconds. the "aircraft" continued their journey in the sky slowly, at some point one of them disappears, the other two climb up towards the sky, a first vertically and then the other two disappear ...
 we were amazed
content.summary: 3 luci che viaggiano troppo vicine per essere aerei. le luci pulsavano lentamente, si accendevano di rosso e si spegnevano. all'improssivo volano verso l'altro e spariscono

content.detailedDescription: My son and i went outside to look for something in my car and he looked up into the sky to the northwest of my house. in front of the clouds was two bright white lights moving around that we had never observed before and i have lived here for 11 years. they were moving very slowly and very much separate from each other. then a third one joined them from the north. the first two went up and disappeared into the cloud. the third one moved around slowly and was a different color form the first two it was orange. it also went up into the clouds. as we stood there dumb founded looking at an empty sky two more came out of the north and moved around slowly and also went up into the clouds. the last two were white like the first two. we did not observe any more as we went inside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 different lights appeared all were separate moving and hovering differently then dissapeared up into a cloud

content.detailedDescription: Testing number of witness bugs

content.summary: Cms witness count test - tg

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 8:20 pm, i was traveling north bound on the i15 cruise control at 70mph, between barstow and halloran springs right before baker. and to my left is saw a cluster of lights which i assumed was a low flying helicopter and didn't pay much attention, when i looked back to see what kind of helicopter, a split second the lights had diapered. the sky was still light a dusky pink orange, so there was no way i could not see the helicopter if it just turned off its lights. before i could think where did it go? a triangle pattern of three lights appeared for about 3 seconds and flashed of at the same time, and then before i could absorb what just happened one bright light appeared and separated into 2 lights coming apart in a straight line. this pattern of 3 and 2 lights repeated and seemed to follow my drive for about 8mins the last pattern i saw was a straight line of lights that turned off one by one. not flares!! no smoke and no sound!! i wish i could have videoed the event but there was no great vantage point, and even thought i could see them clear as day, there was not enough light for my camera phone. hopefully my drawing helps.
content.summary: Cluster than a sequence of patterns

content.detailedDescription: at approx 0126-0155 7 of us witnessed this shape above the louisville metro area. it flew silently and straight from east to west, stopped, then made came back east-south east as we stood watching it. the object then went straight up until out of visibility. this was a clear night. during this event, 2 ups planes came in below this thing. someone had to have reported this. the 7 that witnessed this work for the government, we were at work leaving the area when i looked up and basically stared in disbelief. there were no other lights, no sound. one of the guys tried to photograph this on his i-phone, it never showed up.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle, 3 large round connected red lights formed the bottom

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home from work at roughly 11:10pm, i saw a formation of 4 glowing red lights in a straight line. after viewing them in awe for several seconds, the 2nd red light from the top appeared to "break formation" if you will, listing to my right (the object's left) and a second or two after said movement, it appeared as though the red lights scattered in numerous directions. it was at this point that the skyline was blocked by trees and i lost sight of these lights several seconds later. the whole sighting experience lasted roughly 15-20 seconds. i was alert to the western sky (where the sighting took place) the rest of my commute home which was approximately another 7 miles home. i am somewhat of an astronomy nerd, and i can tell you in all of the star observation i have done i know what a star, planet, airplane, satellite and the iss looks like in the night sky, and this series of lights was unlike anything i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: I saw lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Event 8/19/2011
10:05 pm
as reported to asd by phone today - in their exact words.  i spoke to the husband and wife who witnessed this.  their two teenage children saw it too, but i did not speak to them.  the witnesses refused to make their own report on the mufon website and only wanted to talk to me.  they made me promise not to reveal their identity or contact information.  i asked them to make a drawing and send it to me.  

report: 

"we were pulling into our driveway last night when the radio suddenly went to static and would not work on any channel.  we got out of the car and headed for the house when my wife noticed something just above the tree line at the back of our property.  we live in a suburban area but our yards are pretty big - about 200 feet long and we have a double lot that is 100' wide, and we have lots of trees in the back.  anyway, we watched this bright white object that had a diamond shape and what looked like a long antenna in front of it on one point of the diamond.  it was very close to us - less than 150' feet away at the first point where we saw it.  it looked like it measured about 80 feet or so in length, and about 60 feet in width with a slight dome from the edges to the center on the top and bottom.  we saw it from the side at first, and from the bottom later.  the object was a craft of some type that had structure to it, and it was all white, and actually glowing white.  we could hear a low-pitched hum and a higher-pitched overtone coming from it.  my kids and my wife and i were spellbound, and didn't even think to go inside to get a camera!  i am very upset that we didn't get a picture of it. 

my daughter tried to text her friend but her cell phone went dead as soon as she starged typine.  then my son tried his cell phone and it went dead right after he got his friend on the phone.  they were both fully charged before we left the house earlier.  

anyway, the object just hovered there for a couple of minutes, then slowly rose up and stopped approximately 100��� feet from the ground.  then two bright white balls of light (or fireballs) shot out from underneath the center of it and went in different directions -one to the northwest, and the other to the southeast.  they moved so fast that they were gone in two seconds!  i don't know where they went and lost sight of them.  then the large object started moving towards the northwest slowly at first, then faster. then the craft turned to the south and stopped and the two balls of light came back and went inside it, or more like joined with it. and instantly the thing just took off at a high rate of speed and went straight up and was gone!  we were in shock - none of us could believe what we saw.  we just kept saying ���oh my god.���  i used to be a skeptic but now am a complete believer that there are other beings in the universe besides man.  this was definitely not a helicopter or plane, or any type of man-made vehicle."  we will be watching again tonight to see if it comes back, this time with cameras in hand.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large diamond shape craft emitted two bright balls of light!

content.detailedDescription: Already posted my story im sending photos to max mitchell here are 3u of the 6day photos i got that night and all i ask is please let me know what this was max has my email please contact me and you probably know this but zoom in and look you will find other objects and the biggest one idk what is and the bright one dissapeared after i came back outside
content.summary: Big huge fireball in the sky took pictures and wasnt a fireball at all under closer inspection

content.detailedDescription: 220 south bound martinsville va area in my 18 wheeler saw it fly from right to left over highway 220 just above tree tops fast flying saw few secounds and gone was no jet cause would have heard from that close and it going that fast no sound
content.summary: 20ft long 6ft tall disk or cigar fast

content.detailedDescription: We were packing up my sister for collage and we looked up in the sky. we saw a ufo. it made a square and then stoped in mid air. thein would skip from place to place.
content.summary: It was flashing diffrent colors

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my home looking out the window.  it was raining and lightening.  i was amazed at how much lightening there was.  i was looking straight up into the sky from my window and i saw a pinkish orange ball of light fall from the sky.  if it was lightening, i have never seen anything like it.  the ball of light fell rapidly, but not in a flash.  it did not behave at all like lightening as i know it behaves.  it looked like something was just simply dropped straight down from the sky.  it also looked like there was a mist around it, which could have been the rain giving it a gauzy effect.  i felt like i was simply watching a ball of energy.  it was beautiful.  i lost sight of it as it went down behind some trees in my line of sight.

this could be just lightening, but thought it was different and strange enough to report.
content.summary: Pinkish ball of light fell from sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my home looking out the window.  it was raining and lightening.  i was amazed at how much lightening there was.  i was looking straight up into the sky from my window and i saw a pinkish orange ball of light fall from the sky.  if it was lightening, i have never seen anything like it.  the ball of light fell rapidly, but not in a flash.  it did not behave at all like lightening as i know it behaves.  it looked like something was just simply dropped straight down from the sky.  it also looked like there was a mist around it, which could have been the rain giving it a gauzy effect.  i felt like i was simply watching a ball of energy.  it was beautiful.  i lost sight of it as it went down behind some trees in my line of sight.

this could be just lightening, but thought it was different and strange enough to report.
content.summary: Pinkish ball of light fell from sky.

I was in my home looking out the window.  it was raining and lightening.  i was amazed at how much lightening there was.  i was looking straight up into the sky from my window and i saw a pinkish orange ball of light fall from the sky.  if it was lightening, i have never seen anything like it.  the ball of light fell rapidly, but not in a flash.  it did not behave at all like lightening as i know it behaves.  it looked like something was just simply dropped straight down from the sky.  it also looked like there was a mist around it, which could have been the rain giving it a gauzy effect.  i felt like i was simply watching a ball of energy.  it was beautiful.  i lost sight of it as it went down behind some trees in my line of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting gas at 9:45pm and as i was finishing up i heard a loud humming buzz sound, i wasn't sure what it was at first, i looked up as i got into car and seen a very large shaped object with 4 whitish yellow lights flying east.  i was shocked to see it. the object would have been at least a half mile long. i got my phone out as i pulled up to the stop light and had taken a picture before it was too far to take. my picture came out a bit unfocused but i got it. i tried to follow it as it made a turn to the south and you could tell it was an extremely large object making it's turn, i couldn't keep up and it disappeared from sight as i couldn't keep up in a vehicle and had to obey traffic laws, but even then it was impossible to track. i knew i had just witnessed a ufo and went home and told my girlfriend and called my friend and told them what i had just seen. well i was laughed at me until the next morning my girlfriend found a news report about the exact sighting by other witnesses, she want laughing then!
content.summary: Flying  east then turned south. emitted a humming buzz sound that was loud.

content.detailedDescription: This isn't about an object, this is about when i was a youngster and this happened over a period of several years. i don't know who to talk to, this has been a secret of mine for 40 years. not looking for publicity, just want to know what happened to me? it happened at night when i was in bed. the house would be dark and there would be any where from a couple of lights appearing to maybe around 6 lights depending on how many would show up. at times i would see a light outside my 3rd floor window and knew they were coming. i would scream and tried to talk to them but no sound came out. they would look at me and somehow i got the impression they knew what was i was trying to say/yell. everyday i woke up, i felt disoriented and lost. i have some memories i'm not sure about. i felt like it was friendly like they were checking on me in whatever they were looking for. no one has heard me speak about this, no family. i'm looking for someone that i can talk to, not a shrink but someone that might show some insight. please someone show me some help. i haven't sketched anything, but i can.
content.summary: This is about being  visited, your the only place i feel comfortable about contacting

content.detailedDescription:
Object moved from sse to ssw then changed direction at sharpe angle to nne
and hovered above me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Liguid mercury in circluar tube moving in counterclock wise direction add negative electrical charge = weighless movement

content.detailedDescription: Last night around 8:30pm i was out on my porch talking on the phone with a friend when i saw a strange orange light, it was very bright, and it appeared to drop 2 "fire balls" out of itself and they headed toward the ground, almost like orange flares, then the bright orange light moved slowly in our direction and then moved off to the right and then disappeared.  i tried to capture video of it but my camera is cheap and it didnt register on my video.  my heart was racing, i have never seen anything like it in my life... there were no blinking lights or indications that it was a normal aircraft.  it really freaked me out... my husband saw it as well.
content.summary: Bright orange ball of light that dropped 2 smaller orange balls of light like shooting stars falling straight down from it

content.detailedDescription: When on a spring bear hunt just northwest of silver city n.M., i was awakened by somthing moving past my sleeping bag. where we hunt you have to pack in everything you need, so we had no tent. we were at about 11,000 feet. somthing had kicked dirt into my sleeping bag. i noticed that the ground was quite bright, brighter than day light. i sat up to see what it was, and noticed the light was coming from above. i tried to wake my dad, but could not speak or move. i sat there for what seemed to be an hour, but not sure how long. there was no sound, or wind. i was with my dad, cousin, and his dog, and they did not notice anthing in the night. we had horses, and mules, and they made no noise. in the morning i saw no signs of any of this, and we finished hunting. now i know i have a vivid amagination, but i do not think i was dreaming. not sure what happened, but it was real to me, and i remember it like it was yesterday. there are no roads, or electricity there.
content.summary: Bright light in moutains

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on the balcony with my girlfriend while she was having a smoke at around 10:50pm or so...  we were talking about random things and one of the things she brought up was how the stars were really hard to see tonight..  i immediatly follwed that out in saprae creek, a rural area 15 or so kilometers outside of town where i grew up, you could see the stars much better and they were much brighter...  

after talking some more and right before we went in, actually she was stepping in through the balcony door, i looked up in the sky and seen what looked like a really bright star...  in comparasin to the quite dull stars we see from the balcony, this looked like one from a clear winters night out in saprae...  right after i seen it i looked to tell my girfriend about the bright star and when we looked back to see, it was now moving at what seemed to be a steady pace...  judging from the distance and altitude, i assume the thing was going pretty fast...  sapra creek is maybe 3 or 4 kms from the local air port and the object was far higher in altitude and much faster than anything i ever seen in the sky growing up...  the first thing the popped into my head honestly, was hey ufo, then logical side kicked in and said, hey, satellite...  but then again i seen plenty of sattelites and meteors growing up and this object did not share the same properties...  the object, although at a steady pace, was clearly dissapering into space from some orbital place...  the once bright starlike object moved in a south easternly straight line and got noticably duller the further down the line it got until it was gone...  i did notice the object seemed to have turned red in color just before dissapearing into the night sky...

during this time we tried taking a picture of the object with cell phone and it never came out, so my girlfriend ran inside to get her camera so we could record the event...  by the time she got it out the object would have been to far gone to pick up on camera, but it didn't matter because the batteries died in the camera as soon as she turned it on...

all in all i believe the object was some sort of spacecraft due to the unusually bright light emminating from it and the immence speed in which it departed...  the whole even lasted 2 or 3 minutes and was pret awe inspiring...
content.summary: Glimpse of an unknown light in the sky...  now you see it now you don't...

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on highway 169 we saw one large ufo, at first glance it seemed like a huge falling star or fire ball moving very slowly towards earth. then it stopped and hovered in mid-air, then rose a couple feet. the large ufo emitted a beam from underneath and five smaller lights ejected out the bottom,then they began to circle around the larger ufo in a circle formation while heading downward twords earth in an eastern direction.
content.summary: One large ufo emits beam ejecting five small ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from mcdonalds on old hwy 94 and i noticed some lights just above walgreens. there were many other cars, but none noticed or just didnt care. they were a yellow-orange in color and they did not pulse or flash. the reason i recorded, or tried to, was because i could not see any shape and they all moved freely from each other. i followed them for a minute (approx.) and pulled over at the street near the post office. by the time i pulled over it appeared that they went straight up (not abruptly) and disappeared. i then went to the kfc parking lot and called a couple of friends and reviewed my video. its a really bad video!
content.summary: Saw 4 lights moving independently of each other.

content.detailedDescription: 8:45pm walked out to my backyard to smoke a ciggerette stayed outside at 9:00pm airplane or so it looked with no sound right after that two orbs/lights came speeding out of nowhere moving in odd angles then 10mins later there was 5 then 6 then 7 orbs/lights cirleing each other so i called my nephew and my sister in law outside to look and they saw the same thing  that lasted for a hour they would fly around for a few minutes then stop over and over the orbs/lights would do that 10:05 came inside stummped then i started looking at vids on youtube then i saw yaws site so i started putting my info in so maybe somebody could come with a camera and video these orbs/lights i only have a camera phone and it doesnt work in the dark they are probly still out there right now but i dnt want to wake up my nephew so im staying in for the night 11:14pm
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights that move quick somtimes up to 7 at a time moving at crazy speed and angles then hover and stay still then take off again

content.detailedDescription: Four adults sitting by the camp fire witnessed 6 or more stationary lights in the sky. looked like stars but were brighter and mor yellow orange then the blue light from the sky. we watched them for 20 seconds or more before one by one they started to fade away. weirdest thing i have ever seen!!!
content.summary: Lights in the sky closer than stars, yellow vs blue glow of rest of stars. faded out one at a time. 4 witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning from the movies heading north on hwy 319 between killearn and bradfordville rd. in north tallahassee. i was sober and i had my top down and was cruising about 45 miles per hour. i am 60 years old and retired from the us postal service. i have worked on air force bases and am familiar with all types of flying vehicles. it was dark and partly cloudy. i looked up a noticed in front of me to my right a huge triangle in the sky just above the trees. there are a lot of trees along this stretch of road with a few clearings here and there. at first i thought it was a triangular cell tower because they have three white lights and a red light above them in the middle.
as i drove a little futher it was in a clearing and i could clearly see it wans't a tower. the lights on the ends appeared to be triangular to form the ends and lighted from the inside. what i don't understand is the huge slowly pulsating red domed light in the bottom middle of the craft. it was slowly heading in a southerly direction away from me.
after i saw it i tried to turn into a street to take a picture if i could but some jerk was right behind me and i couldn't turn in. as i went to the next block i knew it was of no avail for me to try to turn because too much distance between the object and me.
a couple of days later i inspected my route in the daytime and again at night. i never saw any tower except a radio tower a few miles north. this object was to my immediate right and heading behind me. no sound, no props, no jets, and no descending, just slow and steady movement.
i was bewildered because i have never seen such a thing. i have heard of these sightings and always dismissed them as experimental aircraft. now that i have seen this and how it moved i know i was wrong in that judgement. this craft was impressive in size and spooky to me!
content.summary: Triangle with bright red underdome in middle, each point lighted

content.detailedDescription:
Attended a fireworks display at bear lake michigan on july 9th about 9:50pm with video camera canon xha1. it was dusk -still somewhat light. i was facing south-southeasr. i spotted a small
but bright yellow-orange light slightly above horizon traveling toward the lake. it seemed  flying at a low trajectory and i thought at first that it was a balloon with a light, or a remote controlled airplane with a light. the object was traveling northwest -west and i next thought that the object was reflecting light from the sun which had already set. i grabbed my camera but i could not locate it in the viewfinder and failed to record it.  within a minute, another object appeared in about the same area and seemed to be flying the same path. i did capture it on video tape and it appeared at first as a round yellow-red fireball moving slowly. as i continued to track it, i noticed a black spot
behind the light. as it continued, the light seemed diminish but the black object seemed to emerge
i believe it was rising and became more illuminated from the sun. finally there was no yellow-red light but a circular round object. my video camera has autofocus - but the object kept going in and out of focus. finally it dissappeared from view. within a minute there was still another yellow-red object originating from about the same area and traveling in the same path. the same thing happened - the object appeared as a yellow-red color firball, then a black object behind the fireball became larger, the yellow-red color rotated and the circular object was apparent. the object eventually disappeared. it was now dark and i anticipated the fireworks were about to happen when still another firball appeared in the same spot. it seemed to travel upward and never crossed the lake but rather continued moving up and disappeared as a small pinpoint of light.

there were hundreds of people on the lake that night all watching for the fireworks. my neighboprs saw the fireball but only saw the yellow orange light which faded -they never observed the circular object.

i captured this on videotape and i am hoping that with better equipment the image can be enhanced and more details can be seen. the digital video clip is too large to email.
content.summary: Fireball

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place on friday, august 19th, 2011 at about 10:20am. the weather was sunny and cloudless. the moon was visible in the western sky.

i was driving west on cleveland road in south bend looking up at the moon when i noticed a strange, dark circular or spherical object at least several hundred feet up in the air, moving east. the object moved parallel with the road at a steady speed with no erratic motion. it was definitely not an airplane, helicopter, or a bird. it was also way too small to be a blimp. the motion was too steady and regular for a balloon. it could possibly have been a satellite of some sort, but the object seemed to change its shape subtly as i observed it, especially toward the end of the sighting, which lasted about 30 seconds. the object reflected sunlight and appeared metallic.

i just got off the phone with a guy at the national ufo reporting hotline (nuforc.Org) and he told me that it could not possibly have been any kind of satellite.

as soon as the object passed from view, i did a sharp u-turn and parked in a nearby driveway, got out of my car, and looked east to try to see the object again, but i couldn't spot it.

i had just been talking to my 4 year old son about the moon and how mysterious it is. just a minute before the sighting he had craned his head down below his belt to peek out the windshield in order to see the moon. he did not see the ufo. 

i was very excited the entire time of the sighting and for about an hour afterward. i knew it had to be something unknown. i'm a student of the ufo literature and have had one previous sighting.
content.summary: A dark sphere or circle several hundred feet up moving east.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting looking at the stars in la verne, ca ( outside of pasadena). then what appeared to be a shooting star changed direction. the object looked to be in distress then out of no where multiple other smaller other ones came to it and were circling it with very fast, fluid motions. it was similar to the ones reported in seoul korea on august 18,2011: (you tube link moved to investigators field) cms 08/19/11 flg. after about an hour after it started a cloud moved and blocked the event and when the cloud moved they were gone.
content.summary: Different sized star like objects with one large one and other smaller ones

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a work function on the night this picture was taken with my iphone. we were on a boat cruise that included dinner, drinks and a close circle of the statue of liberty. the trip began i believe around 7pm and continued until 10 or so. after dinner everyone congregated to the open deck on the top of the boat to admire the sights of the nyc skyline. as the sun was setting many pictures were being taken and i snapped the attached photo. at the time no one witnessed anything out of the ordinary, but when i e-mailed the pic to friends we noticed an object on the right hand side between the 2 tallest buildings and above the glow of the sunset. we have tried to identify it, but anything we come up with seems to have just as easy of an excuse for why it could not be that explanation.
airplane? when zoomed in it does not have any characteristics of an airplane
comet? i know of none in the area, no one saw it at the time and it seems to be ascending, not descending

not making any claims, but would be interested if anyone has any ideas of what the object could have been. it is hard to judge distance as it seems to be closer to the camera than the sun, but somehow it is not backlit but instead seems to either reflect light or emit it. also the fact that it has a "tail" seems to contradict any ideas that it could be a plane or anything reflecting the sun.

just seems to be an object that no one has been able to identify for me yet.
content.summary: Strange object in picture not noticed when taken

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of november 15th, opening day of deer rifle season, the year 1997, i was camped out in my van about a mile across from the cellular phone tower outside of deep water mo. it had snowed slightly in the early morning hours, barely an inch. the daytime temp. was in the teens. after a fruitless day of hunting i retired to my van to grab a bite to eat and warm myself with some hot coffee. as it gets dark by 5:45pm, i was just sitting in the van in a pull in, facing a growed up field imagining that a big buck would cross into my view. the old boy i was after. as one has nothing much to do but plot out the next days plans, i was just thinking of my game plan. while looking out my side window through leaves near a tree i was parked next to, i noticed some lights in the distant sky shining off and on. and now my story begins in all earnesty. i am i think a man's man. i do not fear much on this earth, yet what i was about to have happen to me, being mentally unprepared, would change my way of thinking and/or life forever! i grabbed my binoculars, wallet, and a 9mm pistol i had, not wanting to leave them in the van. i put my pistol in my waist holster, and my coat on to step out in the road to view what i thought was a helicopter about 3/4 to 1 mile away over the dark treeline. as i couldn't quite make out the lights flashing on this object too well, i walked down the road to where it curbs about 70 yards from the van. the road heads out to my left towards the communication tower mentioned earlier, behind me it ends at some rocky bluffs that people like to fish alot from, towards hw 13 out of clinton, mo. when i focused my nikon 8x40 binoculars on the object again, with and without my glasses, i could just make out what appeared to be a dish like form, a red flashing light on the middle top, and what looked like strobe lights flasing in the middle of the object in a circular and uniform manner. i could not hear any sound at that distance, but looking at the object and judging its movement if any against the dark tree line, i came to the conclusion it was hovering and/or stationary. i did think this was odd for a helicopter to be in that area and no sound whatsoever. and in that frame of mind, all i was doing was wondering what could be the purpose. little knowing that my quiet evening was to take a sci-fi turn out of a movie! as i was just standing watching this object, i happened to look to my left, down that section of county road, possibly 1/4 mile in length and was shocked to see a blue like, lazer beam of light come from the sw horizen and make a 90 degree drop straight down to the earth, which seemed to be at the end of the road i was standing on. standing on mind you! i may have not put as much thought into what the disk like object i was looking at seconds ago, to be no more than some sort of man made craft, helicopter, etc, but this lazer light as you can guess made me take a very profound interest in what was happening around me in the star filled, cold, dark heavens! i gazed intently in the direction of that beam of light which made no sound, yet didn't see anything. i then put my binoculars on the disk like object and saw that it was still in the same area and still flashing its lights the same as before. after what seemed like 5 minutes, out of the corner of my left eye, another blueish lazer beam of light appeared from the same area of the horizon from the sw as the 1st beam, and in the blink of an eye it stopped halfway down the road, above the tree line next to the road i was standing in. i can only describe this orb as one might say to be somewhat egg shaped,fuzzy in color, white around the edge, with a pilot flame like bluish tint of color, taking up 80% of the middle diameter. the hair went up on my neck and head as it very slowly, yet quietly seem to be floating down the tree line towards me! i seemed to instantly forget that i had a fully loaded 9mm pistol in the back of my waist! i was very proficient with this firearm, yet the fear that seemed to overcome me made me even lose touch with the very ground i stood on. i was as one might say, revitted in place. i quickly looked back at the disk and it was still there doing the same thing as before. in turning quickly back to watch the orb float towards me down the tree line, i tried to judge its size by taking my hand and encircling it with my fingers, i judged it to be at arms length about the size of a golf ball or slightly larger. in the process of doing this i also judged the height above to treeline to what one might think as 40 ft.Or so. i cannot safely say that this orb was directly over the tree line or just behind it. but it was in full view. after getting this info in my head it had closed the distance to me by more than halfway. by then it looked to be the size of a baseball! to say i was getting worried is an unearthly understatement! then out of the same sw horizon another lazer like beam, and a 2nd orb lines up directly behind the first orb! possibly 100 ft. or so apart. they both are floating along silently still coming towards me. as they near the end of the tree line, the curve i am standing in has a field road cutting into a grown up field that lays across their path, this i am nearly facing, although slightly to the left as i am understandably watching their immenant progress towards me. all of a sudden, in the blink of an eye, the 2nd orb behind the 1st orb, drops down underneath and is directly lined up as if tied together both silently coming on. i cup my ears and hear nothing, no humming, nothing! as they both cross the opening directly across from me, an incredibly bright, neon green, "v" shaped light seems to light up the star filled night sky where i had no view of anything but that light in that split second. in that light i just snapped a photo in my minds eye, was what seemed to look like a unbroken smoke ring, much as a feather would look like descending to the ground. how anyone could not possibly see this from hw 13 over the grand river arm of the lake is beyond me. but in that light i did not see either of the orbs. but as soon as the light was gone, what i assumed to be the 1st orb was slowly continuing that same path over the treeline to my right. it started to slightly veer upwards at a 45 degree angle and as it was in the direction as the disk further away, which i had not looked at for obvious reasons, i took a quick look and the disk shaped object was moving away over the far tree line in the general direction of clinton,mo. much the speed as a helicopter would. as i then looked back and up at the orb it was still at a 45 degree angle and all at once, like the starship enterprise of tv fame, it left in the only way i can see and think it! (in warp drive) to infinity and beyond! a blue lazer like tail, with the orb at the front, which move so quickly, that the tail was taken along with it and it looked to take its place in the stars of the universe and become a star! that is the only way i can describe how fast it moved and how long i saw it.

after watching and going thru all of this, what seemed to be an afterthought was that next to that 2nd tree line to my right was a parked, datson like truck with a camper shell on it. i never noticed this before or fully forgot about it as the night sky was filled with these happenings! i was hoping someone was there in that area with me and had maybe viewed the same things i had. i was truly hoping that i wasn't by myself out there as i had this feeing after the bright neon green light filled the night sky, something had landed. how far away, i had no idea! maybe someone was sleeping in the truck, in the back of the bed. i told myself to stay calm and go to the truck and look around, and if i saw them in the cab, as i had a small mini-mag light, to light my way to them to show i was there. but what if there was no one there? i eased up to the cab, covered the light just enough to look inside, and saw blaze orange apparel and a hunting rifle. could this person have gone into town with friends? was he sleeping in the back? i took a chance hoping i wouldn't be thought of as someone out to rob them or do some other mischeif, and called out quietly to ask if any one was in the truck! a 2nd time, no response. damn my luck! it was then that i knew i wasn't myself. i did not have control of my emotions. i knew what i had to say, and as i used the light to tap on the bed of the truck, i heard someone stir. then a man asked me what i wanted? i at first tried to tell him that i wasn't drinking, nor smoking weed, but there was something happening out here in the sky and i would like him to look with me to prove to myself that it had happened as i saw it, if it was to keep on happening. i could not talk straight to him. my words came jumbled and run together out of my mouth, i was shaking like a leaf! it was fear! never had i ever experianced that kind of emotion! i can still think of that moment and relive those thoughts today. albeit with less intensity. the man came out, i cannot remember his name, and talked with me and we watched the sky for over an hour, but the lights were gone. it took that long and possibly longer talking with him to feel myself actually touch the ground again. i know not his name, nor ever saw him again, but will always be thankful he was there to calm me down. he mentioned he flew back in the 50's and/or 60's and he and his co-pilot would see things as ufo's but not go thru the trouble of reporting as it would cause them problems with the airline they flew for. and that is the end of my story. i hope it will be usefull to others, and the only thing i would like to see is for someone to put on video what i saw and let others see and/or relive what i or they might have seen also!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disk, 2 orbs, and a laser light show!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was a maintenance worker for the state of maryland. we got a call to the maryland archive building, there was a bathroom exaust fan not working. i went to the roof of the building, and was working on the fan. my partner, we will call him tom,<not his real name> had a work radio like i did. <all of the workers have one.> i was in a prone position while working on this exaust fan. when i rolled over to reach a tool, and to give my aching neck muscles a break, i happened to look up, and, there in the distance, was a chrome, shiney object. annapolis is in the flight vector for alot of air traffic, so i was used to airplane and the like being in the sky. so when i looked up, and saw this sphere, it caught my interest. it looked to be several miles away, due to the haze. it was plainly rotating at a high rate of speed, and, strangest of all, it would periodically dissapear! i timed it on my watch, and it would be visible, and spinning, then, dissapear for 1minute. then reappear for a minute. i called tom up there, saying i needed some help, and i had him check it out. he said "i dont believe it. i'm lookin right at it, and i still dont believe it." at this point, we both observed airplanes in its vicinity, so we could kinda place where it was. it was directly above the flight vector for all the planes, bute below some of the really high flyers. seeing the planes really helped us out, because it kinda showed us its position and size, as close as we could guess. it looked to be comprable size to a 747, give or take. thats about all i can remember. thanks for listening.
content.summary: A pulsing chrome like sphere, that appeared to be rotating and hovering. i
